QuestData.Title: The Farmer's Daughter
QuestData.Description: Brave $c, you could not have arrived at a better time. My daughter is missing!$b$bI've got a suspicion that the virmen took her down into that stinking little warren of theirs. I'm too old to fight virmen, and my farmhand is already exhausted from fighting them off all morning.$b$bCould you look for her?
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Find Mina Mudclaw within the Springtail Warren in the Valley of the Four Winds.
QuestData.RewardText: No... no... get back... I don't want...$b$bWait, you're not a carrot. You're not a virmen either. You're here to save me?
